metadata.title: CVE-2014-9970 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
jasypt before 1.9.2 allows a timing attack against the password hashcomparison.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9970` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjasypt-java - 1.9.2-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jasypt package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.2-1').
